page.title: 02DICKENS FESTIVAL,BROADSTAIRS
page.content: {Dickens Festival Week Broadstairs turned back the clock in the week 15th-22nd June 1985 to the mid-19th century.This was when Charles Dickens lived and worked in this sea side resort.During the eight days of the festival,Broadstairs heard the sound of rustling skirts and petticoats and the tapping of gentlemen's walking canes as members of the Broadstairs Dickens fellowship paraded in period costume. On Saturday June 15th there was a grand assembly of costumed Dickensians. Many events took place including a Victorian village cricket match,a bathing party at Viking Bay,a garden party, country fair, conducted walk,festival dance and a performance at the Pavillion Theatre of Great Expecations by Charles Dickens.This festival is nearing its 50th anniversary.
